item.title: Why Are Cats So Protective of Their Paws? Unraveling the Mystery Behind Their Sacred Tools - FurryTails
item.description: Why Are Cats So Protective of Their Paws? Unraveling the Mystery Behind Their Sacred Tools Have you ever wondered why your cat is so protective of their paws and prefers not to have them touched?
